ai-iti23:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti23:2.1_0: “This one thing, mendicants, when developed and cultivated, secures benefits for both
ai-iti23:2.2_0: the present life and lives to come.
ai-iti23:2.5_0: This is the one thing that, when developed and cultivated, secures benefits for both
ai-iti23:2.6_0: the present life and lives to come?”
ai-iti23:2.7_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti23:4.3_0: That wise one is the teacher
ai-iti23:5.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
